lyrics.text: Hmm
Khud pe sahara hai jaanam, tumhare sahare nahi hai
Dil ka ye darya la-faani hai, isme kinaare nahi hain
Qarz hai mere kuch tujhpar jo maine utaare nahi hain
Qarz hai tere kuch mujhpar wo tujhse to pyaare nahi hain
Kuchal diya phoolon ko tere inn qadmon ne
Jo bacha wo loota apnon ne
Ujadh to gaya mere baagh
Par baaki mehek hai, usse sabaq lu mein
Qalam toh bas rakh dun mein
Baandhun samaan apna, chal du mein
Kahi bhi baithun, bas tujhpe hi likhta hun
Dekho kitna besharam hun mein
Kuchal diya apne armaano ko
Masmaar kiya hai maikhaano ko
Iss baar tum aaye toh mein tumhe bhoolay se bhi ab na jaane du
Kuchal diya apne armaano ko
Masmaar kiya hai maikhaano ko
Ayaan hi nahi hoti mujhpe tum
Jis bhi taraf dekho
Jis bhi tarah dekhun
Dhoondha kinaaro pe kabhi
Dhoondhe sitaaron me kahin
Dhoondha bazaaron me tujhe
Qadawar pahaadon me kahin
Tu hai nahi, tu hai nahi
Tu ho ke bhi, kyun hai nahi?
Tu hai nahi, tu hai nahi
Tu ho ke bhi, kyun hai nahi?
Kitna sataaye teri yaadein hame
Par kya karein, ab kaafi khud ke liye
Gile na koi, na hai tujhse shikwe
The tumse pehle jaise, wohi rahay (Hmm)
Kho ke hi aani thi kya tum ko qadar?
Acha nahi lagta mujhko tera zikar
Ab ham jab mehfilon me baithe hotay aksar
Aur rehna hai hawa se ho ke befikar
Ham the kinaaron pe haan saath tere
Par tu toh panchi, udhe baadalon me
Hamne bhi jaane diya haathon se ye
Rishta jo jorr ke bhi na jurr sake
Mein hun wahin, mein hun wahin
Ab rehti hai teri kami
Mein hun wahin, mein hun wahin
Ab rehti hai teri kami
Dhoondha kinaaro pe kabhi
Dhoondhe sitaaron me kahin
